column1: Couples who do not openly talk to each other are more likely to have problems with sexual intimacy.
Sildenafil (Viagra), vardenafil (Levitra, Staxyn), and tadalafil (Cialis) are medicines prescribed for ED.
Tadalafil (Cialis) may last for up to 36 hours.
- Sildenafil (Viagra) should be taken on an empty stomach.
(Levitra) and tadalafil (Cialis) may be taken with or without food.
If you have heart disease, talk with your provider before using these medicines.
Men who take nitrates for heart disease should not take ED medications.
